root.name: Pocket Tennis Color
root.description: Overview Pocket Tennis Color Is a Tennis game in the Pocket Sports line of games for the Neo Geo Pocket Color. This game supports both the Neo Geo Pocket as well as the Neo Geo Pocket Color. This game also supports the Link Cable for multiplayer support. Characters Pocket Tennis Color features ten playable characters, two of which are unlockable. AliceAmiba (Unlockable)DavidHiyamaKaoru (Unlockable)LeeLouisLucyMaoTanaka
